name: v voting
author: niana

sections.description: these plugin create a custom post type voting which is uses to store the event information it also create database for storing the voting details of every user for particular event
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates
